airquality 0.1.0
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

AQI()
Calculate the US AQI from pollutant observations
CAAQS()
Assess the attainment of the Canadian Ambient Air Quality Standards (CAAQS)
get_abgov_data()
Download air quality station observations from the Alberta (Canada) Government
get_abgov_stations()
Download air quality station metadata from the Alberta (Canada) Government
get_airnow_data()
Download air quality station observations from the US EPA "AirNow" platform
get_airnow_stations()
Download air quality station metadata from the US EPA "AirNow" platform
get_bcgov_data()
Download air quality station observations from the British Columbia (Canada) Government
get_bcgov_stations()
Download air quality station metadata from the British Columbia (Canada) Government
get_station_data()
Gather air quality observations from multiple networks and data sources
get_thingspeak_data()
Get data from a ThingSpeak channel
purpleair_api()
Interface with the PurpleAir API
taylor_diagram()
Create a Taylor diagram to assess model performance using the relationship between correlation, standard deviation, and centered RMS error.
tile_plot()
Create tiled summary diagrams to assess relationships in a variable based on two grouping variables
wind_rose()
Create wind rose diagrams to assess patterns in wind speed and direction

Developed by Brayden Nilson.
